title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use the JavaScript Date object constructor with the value '3/2/2005' as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown. The code snippet causing the error is: new Date('3/2/2005')4.
OB: When using the value new Date('3/2/2005') as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown.
EB: Filtering the table using the value new Date('3/2/2005') should not produce an error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new data source and a data set that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table in the UI.
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column in the table.
4. In the value1 field of the filter, enter the value new Date('3/2/2005').
